title: I'll Be Gone in the Dark: Episode 1: Murder Habit
description:
FAM!! We're SO excited to share episode 1 of our Patreon coverage of "I'll Be Gone in the Dark." It is truly one of the best series we've ever covered and we think it's some of our best work!!

You can find all 6 episode right now and ad free on Patreon! That's where you'll also find over 150 FULL BONUS episodes covering everything from "Tiger King" to "The Jinx" to "Making a Murderer." Check it out!

Michelle Mcnamara was the original True Crime Addict. She was obsessed with an elusive criminal from Northern California who was known to have committed at least 50 rapes and 12 murders. She dubbed him The Golden State Killer. This is the story of her years hunting him and how, almost 45 years after his reign of terror, he was finally caught.Â
itunes:author: Obsessed Network
dc:creator: Obsessed Network
